title: Distribution
p_when: When distributing a Live2d model that uses Vitamins, you should first complete the binding and adjusting of Live2d Parameters within the VTS and ensure that each Live2d Parameter behaves properly.
p_model: Then go to the model directory of the VTS and zip the model folder, which should then contain the VTS configuration file. It looks like - modelname.vtube.json
p_save: Then go to the save directory in Vitamins and send script(.vps) file(s) you used on this model to your client separately.
